title: Katakoi no Nikki Shoujo
sinopse:
Collection of 6 short stories:

-   Musume no Toshigoro no Musume (娘の年頃の娘)
-   Torikahebaya de Aimashou (とりかへばやで出会いましょう)
-   Katakoi no Nikki Shoujo (片恋の日記少女)
-   Genshoku Megane Danshi Hyouhon (原色メガネ男子標本)
-   Machibito Kitari (待ち人キタリ)
-   Chichi to Musuko to Buridaikon (父と息子とブリ大根)

(Source: Manga Updates)
